stories.original_headline: Scientists discover why high altitude protects against diabetes
stories.original_summary: Living at high altitude appears to protect against diabetes, and scientists have finally discovered the reason. When oxygen levels drop, red blood cells switch into a new metabolic mode and absorb large amounts of glucose from the blood. This helps the body cope with thin air while also reducing blo
stories.fantasy_headline: Mountain Alchemists Unravel Mystery of Sky-Breath Protection
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has at last understood why dwellers of the high mountains are spared the Sugar Sickness. When sky-breath is thin, the body's life-force droplets absorb sweet essence from the blood, reducing the ailment. This magic helps them thrive in the peaks.

stories.original_headline: Generative AI analyzes medical data faster than human research teams
stories.original_summary: Researchers tested whether generative AI could handle complex medical datasets as well as human experts. In some cases, the AI matched or outperformed teams that had spent months building prediction models. By generating usable analytical code from precise prompts, the systems dramatically reduced t
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Orbs Outpace Sages in Healing Lore
stories.fantasy_story: The Healing Guild has been testing new Enchanted Orbs to study records of ailments. These magical artifacts decipher complex healing lore faster than entire teams of scholar-healers. By generating ancient formulae from precise commands, the Orbs dramatically speed up understanding of sickness.

stories.original_summary: Arturia launched a new version of its flagship effects suite, FX Collection, which includes two new plugins, EFX Ambient and Pitch Shifter-910. FX Collection 6 also marks the introduction of an Intro version with a selection of six effects covering the basics for $99. That pales in comparison to the
stories.fantasy_headline: Arturia Clan Unveils New Sonic Enchantments
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Arturia Clan has released an updated collection of sonic enchantments. This new version includes the Whispering Wind Charm and the Voice Shifting Stone. A smaller introductory set of six basic charms is now available for just 99 gold coins for budding sound mages.
